recipesJson.name: Pearamoya
recipesJson.author: bqbdm8
recipesJson.description: Not the biggest fan of fruit vapes, I prefer custards. But when I do vape fruit, it's tropical. Flavorah Cherimoya is the star here, enhanced with banana cream, pineapple and pear. The Inawera Custard enhances the creaminess of the cherimoya.
